channel.title: Ps3 fix
channel.description: About 4 months ago, my ps3 had the YLOD. About 2 weeks ago, I got it fixed and it was playing fine. However, in the past 2 days, it has decided to shut down on me. I'll bring up a game and in about 5-10 minutes, the ps3 just shuts down. The red light blinks, then it goes back to normal. It won't re-enter YLOD, it just shuts down. I have a fan blowing cool air into the system, not making a difference. Any suggestions? I'm open to anything.

item.title: Ps3 fix
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

About 4 months ago, my ps3 had the YLOD. About 2 weeks ago, I got it fixed and it was playing fine. However, in the past 2 days, it has decided to shut down on me. I’ll bring up a game and in about 5-10 minutes, the ps3 just shuts down. The red light blinks, then it goes back to normal. It won’t re-enter YLOD, it just shuts down. I have a fan blowing cool air into the system, not making a difference. Any suggestions? I’m open to anything.
